title: Button to submit a ticket at the riot support website doesn't work.
body: I keep trying to sbumit a ticket but the button doesn't work. I have tried multiple browsers. What do I do?

replies.body: What specifically happens when you click that button? Does it give you any type of error or does it simply not respond at all? Maybe try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) really quick for now.
